tue.yellow

Class Bed

  • java.lang.Object
    • tue.yellow.Bed

  • public class Bed
extends java.lang.Object
    Bed is the class for all beds that exist in the emergency department. Patients can be assigned to a bed object. When a patient is in a bed, he/she can receive treatment.
    Author:
    Team Yellow

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bed

        public Bed(java.lang.String name,
           Bed.Zone zone,
           Bed.Urgency urgency)
        Creates a bed object, using three input values:
        1) name of the bed
        2) zone of the bed
        3) urgency level of the bed

        These input values are set to the data members of the object.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the bed
        zone - the zone of the bed (TRAUMA/NO_INJURY)
        urgencyLevel - the urgency level of the bed (URGENT/NOT_URGENT)

      • getAssignedPatient

        public Patient getAssignedPatient()
        Gets the patient that is assigned to the bed.
        Returns:
        patient that is assigned to the bed

      • setAssignedPatient

        public void setAssignedPatient(Patient assignedPatient)
        Assigns a patient to the bed if the following conditions are met:
        • The patient's zone is the same as the bed's zone
        • The patient's urgency level is the same as the bed's urgency level
        • The bed is currently empty
        • The patient is currently WAITING_FOR_BED

        Furthermore, when a patient is in a chair at the moment of assigning him/her to the bed, the patient will be released from the chair and then assigned to the bed.

        Parameters:
        assignedPatient - the patient to be assigned to the bed

      • releasePatient

        public void releasePatient(Patient assignedPatient)
        Removes the patient from the bed. Only patients that are actually assigned to a bed can be released from that specific bed. This method removes the bed from the patient, and sets the patient status to LEFT_ER. After all, when a patient leaves the bed, he/she will leave the emergency room, even if they move to another in-patient unit.
        Parameters:
        assignedPatient - the patient to leave the bed

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Displays the information of a bed object
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Bed information: Name, Zone, Urgency Level, Assigned Patient (name)
